name: part_004
file: tmp_【#holoIDChromaticFuture 】Free Partial - hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future [ScI02LHlT-w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Kobo Kanaeru, Vestia Zeta, and Kaela Kovalskia interacting with the audience and discussing previous and upcoming performances.

subtitles.original: えっ、やだで。
subtitles.english: Eee, okay then...

subtitles.original: Kalau... nggak boleh...
subtitles.english: If... you can't...

subtitles.original: ...rebutan Kobo sama Zeta...
subtitles.english: ...fight over Kobo and Zeta...

subtitles.original: ...hmmm, ya udah deh kita main aja deh sama penonton.
subtitles.english: ...hmmm, okay then, let's just play with the audience.

subtitles.original: Kobo pengen deh coba kita teriakin penonton,
subtitles.english: Kobo wants to try shouting at the audience,

subtitles.original: karena kan tadi mereka udah teriakin kita.
subtitles.english: because they were shouting at us earlier.

subtitles.original: Iya iya iya... maksudnya kita teriakin ini... bareng penonton-tachi.
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah... I mean, we'll shout this... together with the audience-tachi.

subtitles.original: Betul! Teriakin bareng penonton, jangan teriakin penontonnya.
subtitles.english: Correct! Shout together with the audience, don't shout at them.

subtitles.original: Iya gitu maksudnya.
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's what I meant.

subtitles.original: Soalnya kan habis ini kita harus nyanyi,
subtitles.english: Because after this we have to sing,

subtitles.original: jadi kita harus simpen suara dulu nggak sih?
subtitles.english: so we should save our voices first, right?

subtitles.original: Betul ya. Gak bakal lama itu ternyata...
subtitles.english: Right. It won't be that long...

subtitles.original: Tenang aja nggak bakal selama durasi stream Kaela ya guys ya.
subtitles.english: Don't worry, it won't be as long as Kaela's stream duration, guys.

subtitles.original: Eee, ya udahlah... mau teriak-teriak? Ya udah aku nggak masalah deh, aku ikut.
subtitles.english: Eee, alright then... want to shout? I don't mind, I'll join.

subtitles.original: Gimana nih semuanya? Udah siap belum?
subtitles.english: How about it, everyone? Are you ready?

subtitles.original: Siap nih kayaknya. Oke, Kobo dulu ya.
subtitles.english: Seems like they're ready. Okay, Kobo first.

subtitles.original: Aku mau kita sama-sama teriak 'Baka baka baka!'
subtitles.english: I want us to shout 'Baka baka baka!' together.

subtitles.original: Oke, siap ya!
subtitles.english: Okay, ready?

subtitles.original: Satu, dua, tiga...
subtitles.english: One, two, three...

subtitles.original: BAKA BAKA BAKA!
subtitles.english: BAKA BAKA BAKA!

subtitles.original: Suka suka! Giliran Zeta, giliran Zeta.
subtitles.english: Suka suka! Zeta's turn, Zeta's turn.

subtitles.original: Oke oke oke.
subtitles.english: Okay, okay, okay.

subtitles.original: Pas aku bilang 'Mission Stasto', kalian bareng-bareng teriak 'Stasto' ya.
subtitles.english: When I say 'Mission Stasto', you all shout 'Stasto' together.

subtitles.original: Siap?
subtitles.english: Ready?

subtitles.original: A-A-A... Mission...
subtitles.english: A-A-A... Mission...

subtitles.original: STASTO!
subtitles.english: STASTO!

subtitles.original: Oke, habis ini Kaela.
subtitles.english: Okay, next is Kaela.

subtitles.original: Oke oke oke... nah apa ya... buat semua penonton sama HoloHeroes juga...
subtitles.english: Okay, okay, okay... well... for all the audience and HoloHeroes too...

subtitles.original: Kalau misalnya aku bilang 'HoloHeroes', kalian bilang 'Hoo-Hah!' Gampang kan?
subtitles.english: If I say 'HoloHeroes', you say 'Hoo-Hah!' Simple, right?

subtitles.original: Langsung langsung langsung... oke ya? Siap ya?
subtitles.english: Straight away... okay? Ready?

subtitles.original: HoloHeroes!
subtitles.english: HoloHeroes!

subtitles.original: HOO-HAH!
subtitles.english: HOO-HAH!

subtitles.original: Mantap mantap mantap!
subtitles.english: Mantap, mantap, mantap!

subtitles.original: Keren keren keren. Akhirnya Gen 3 kompak juga.
subtitles.english: Cool, cool, cool. Finally, Gen 3 is in sync too.

subtitles.original: Iya, kompak kelihatannya. Masih pada semangat nih ya.
subtitles.english: Yeah, looks in sync. Everyone's still spirited, right?

subtitles.original: Soalnya dari lagu pertama kita hari ini aja udah kerasa banget.
subtitles.english: Because it was already very apparent from our first song today.

subtitles.original: Kalian tuh pada nyangka nggak sih kalau lagu pertama kita tuh bakal '100%'?
subtitles.english: Did you guys expect our first song would be '100%'?

subtitles.original: Beh, mana ada yang nyangka. Aku aja sendiri nggak nyangka juga.
subtitles.english: Psh, who would've thought. Even I didn't expect it.

subtitles.original: Langsung dibuka dengan 'Hoshinova Mode' gitu. Keren banget kan?
subtitles.english: Starting right off with 'Hoshinova Mode' like that. So cool, right?

subtitles.original: Kece banget sih... apalagi tadi Zeta sama Kaela nyanyi '100%'
subtitles.english: It was so cool... especially when Zeta and Kaela sang '100%'

subtitles.original: ...tuh udah kayak real 100% ya.
subtitles.english: ...it was like real 100%.

subtitles.original: Itu tuh bisa nggak sih... nggak sekeren tadi?
subtitles.english: Is it even possible... to not be as cool as that?

subtitles.original: Aku tuh jadi pengen kayak... 'ugh, ugh' gitu kan kalian?
subtitles.english: I just wanted to go... 'ugh, ugh', you know?

subtitles.original: Kalian pernah nggak sih nyanyi lagu sekeren tadi? Aura farming ya...
subtitles.english: Have you guys ever sung a song as cool as that? Truly aura farming...

subtitles.original: Aura farming sesungguhnya. Keren banget emang lagunya Moona.
subtitles.english: The ultimate aura farming. Moona's song is indeed very cool.

subtitles.original: Emang kan Zeta kan soalnya biasanya lagu-lagu yang stylish, yang jazzy jazzy gitu...
subtitles.english: Because Zeta usually sings stylish, jazzy songs...

subtitles.original: Jadi tadi pas dinyanyiin tuh ya '100%' rasanya jadi beda banget vibes-nya.
subtitles.english: So when she sang '100%', the vibes felt completely different.

subtitles.original: Terus Kaela juga tadi ngerap ya... 'ta-da-da-da-da-da-da'... kayak apa tuh?
subtitles.english: Then Kaela was rapping too... 'ta-da-da-da-da-da-da'... like what was that?

subtitles.original: Ta-da-da-da-da-da-da... iya pokoknya keren banget tadi.
subtitles.english: Ta-da-da-da-da-da-da... yeah, it was just so cool.

subtitles.original: Keren banget ya tadi... tapi habis ini tuh masih ada lagi... 'New Zombie'.
subtitles.english: It was so cool... but after this, there's even more... 'New Zombie'.

subtitles.original: Ayo, pada tahu dong ini lagu siapa?
subtitles.english: Come on, you guys know whose song this is, right?

subtitles.original: Tahu lah, tahu lah... Senpai kita, Senpai kita.
subtitles.english: Of course, of course... our Senpai's, our Senpai's.

subtitles.original: Tadi tuh itu ya... Holoro performance-nya juga keren banget, kayak lagi di game gitu.
subtitles.english: Earlier... the Holoro performance was also so cool, like being in a game.

subtitles.original: Betul! Setuju. Terus tadi ada backdancer-nya, men!
subtitles.english: Correct! Agreed. And there were backdancers, man!

subtitles.original: Keren ya guys, keren nggak?
subtitles.english: Cool, right guys? Wasn't it cool?

subtitles.original: Keren!
subtitles.english: Cool!

subtitles.original: Ada apa lagi tuh tadi? Lampu laser, terus ada efek kembang api segara...
subtitles.english: What else was there? Laser lights, then firework effects and all...

subtitles.original: ...terus banyak lah gimmick-gimmick yang wow.
subtitles.english: ...and many wow gimmicks.

subtitles.original: Itu backdancer-nya nanti aku hire semua ya buat solo konser aku.
subtitles.english: I'm going to hire all those backdancers for my solo concert later.

subtitles.original: Wah, udah ngomong konser solo aja.
subtitles.english: Whoa, talking about a solo concert already.

subtitles.original: Ini omongan adalah doa ya.
subtitles.english: Words are prayers, you know.

subtitles.original: Iya... tapi konser yang ini belum selesai... belum belum belum.
subtitles.english: Yeah... but this concert isn't over yet... not yet, not yet.

subtitles.original: Eh, tapi kalian tahu nggak sih sebelum ini tuh nyanyinya lagu apa?
subtitles.english: Eh, but do you guys know what song was sung before this?

subtitles.original: Eh, aku mah tahu banget lah. Itu lagu terbaru aku... Dalah.
subtitles.english: Eh, I know very well. It's my newest song... Dalah.

subtitles.original: Iya, udah... nggak usah dibahas... dalah...
subtitles.english: Yeah, fine... no need to discuss it... dalah...

subtitles.original: Loh kok gitu? Itu tuh maksudnya judulnya 'Dalah', lagunya judulnya 'Dalah'.
subtitles.english: Hey, why like that? I meant the title is 'Dalah', the song title is 'Dalah'.

subtitles.original: Oooo... iya iya iya... oalah...
subtitles.english: Oooo... right, right, right... oalah...

subtitles.original: Dalah... bilang dong... abisnya kan kamu sering 'dalah, dalah' gitu...
subtitles.english: 'Dalah'... say so... because you often say 'dalah, dalah' like that...

subtitles.original: Jadi dikirain emang beneran 'dalah'...
subtitles.english: So I thought it was just the usual 'dalah'...

subtitles.original: Entar 'dalah dalah' pulang dia... kasihan jangan dalah.
subtitles.english: She might just say 'dalah dalah' and go home... poor thing, don't say 'dalah'.

subtitles.original: Kalau gitu 'Dalah' tuh maksudnya apa sih?
subtitles.english: Then what does 'Dalah' actually mean?

subtitles.original: 'Dalah' sama kehidupan... hidup tuh berat ya guys ya...
subtitles.english: 'Dalah' with life... life is hard, you know guys...

subtitles.original: Kalau hidup berat ya udah 'dalah' aja, abis itu lanjutkan hidupmu, begitu.
subtitles.english: If life is hard, just say 'dalah', then continue with your life, like that.

subtitles.original: Iya betul teman-teman... di kehidupan yang dewasa ini ya...
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's right friends... in this adult life...
